When I explain that all politicians do X, then it is not fair to assert, without further context, that I said a specific group of politicians do X. I made clear in my answers to your questions that I was describing politics and politicians in general, not just HFC.

The piece mischaracterizes what I told @bterris. I said *politics* itself is performance art—something I’ve long decried, especially with respect to Congress. I noted that HFC acts no worse than other congressional Republicans w/r/t Trump. They’re performing like everyone else.
